meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America
To make technical corrections to the Guam World War II Loyalty Recognition Act.

main.name: HR1365

content.p: To make technical corrections to the Guam World War II Loyalty Recognition Act.

main.enactingFormula: Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

section.heading: Technical corrections to Guam World War II Loyalty Recognition Act.
section.chapeau: Title XVII of division A of Public Law 114–328 is amended—

subparagraph.content: by striking “equal to” and inserting “not to exceed”; and
by striking “covered into the Treasury as miscellaneous receipts” and inserting “used to reimburse the applicable appropriations”;

paragraph.content: in section 1704(a) by striking “, subject to the availability of appropriations,” and inserting “from the Claims Fund”; and

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
